Description: Papyrus; Demotic legal text recto; names of witnesses verso. Document used for the administration of the temple of Soknebtunis in Tebtunis. It contains a list of priests of Soknebtunis who were also serving as priests in the cult of Sokonopis, probably intended for the chief priest of Sokonopis who was responsible for dividing temple revenue into offering -shares for the priests.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: A. Monson 'Priests of Sokenbtunis and Sokonpis: P BM EA 10647' JEA 92 (2006), 205-16
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (107421) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/107421)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: frayed, loss, fractured, fragile Black ink (smudged) Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: fair - lacunae
